titles.title: Elimination of the Single Parent Tax Act of 2008
A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit States from charging child support recipients for the collection of child support.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10670)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
11/19/2008--Introduced.
Elimination of Single Parent Tax Act of 2008 - Amends part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit states from charging child support recipients for the collection of child support.
